scripts.test:coverage: nyc mocha test/unit test/int && nyc report -r html && nyc check-coverage
scripts.test:watch: yarn run watch 'yarn run build && mocha -b test/unit test/int || exit 1'
scripts.build: set -uex; yarn run build:ts; yarn run build:docs
scripts.build:ts: tsc --build tsconfig.types.json tsconfig.esm.json tsconfig.cjs.json && mv dist/cjs/pinky.js dist/cjs/pinky.cjs
scripts.build:docs: set -uex; yarn run build:docs:md; yarn run build:docs:html
scripts.build:docs:md: typedoc --out docs --plugin typedoc-plugin-markdown --sort static-first --sort alphabetical src/pinky.ts
scripts.build:docs:html: typedoc --out docs/pages --theme default --sort static-first --sort alphabetical src/pinky.ts
scripts.release:test: set -uex; yarn test; npm version prerelease; npm publish --access public --tag testing
scripts.release:patch: set -uex; git pull; rm -rf node_modules; yarn; true||yarn run test:coverage; yarn run test:lint; yarn run build:ts; npm version patch; git push; npm publish --access public; git push --tags
